assessment_item.title: ಮೊದಲನೇ ಮಹಾಯುದ್ಧ ಅಂತ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಈ ಒಪ್ಪಂದವು ಜರುಗಿತು.
assessment_item.body:

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:5007"},{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5012"},{"text":"

ತಾಷ್ಕೆಂಟ್ ಒಪ್ಪಂದ
